# Copilot Slash Commands (S2 SDE)

These prompt files replicate the Cursor slash commands for **VS Code GitHub Copilot**.

## Usage

1. Open the **Chat view** (Ctrl+Alt+I)
2. Type `/` in the chat input
3. Select a command or type to filter (e.g. `/question`, `/review`)
4. Add your input when prompted

| Command | Description |
|---------|--------------|
| `/question` | Ask about project, program, schedule |
| `/review` | Code review against SDE standards |
| `/help-assignment` | Help with assignments |
| `/explain-concept` | Explain a concept |
| `/plan-iteration` | Plan portfolio iteration work |
| `/help-research` | Research document (DOT Framework) |
| `/check-learning-outcomes` | Check LO coverage |
| `/review-portfolio` | Portfolio review & guidance |

## Tip

Use the **Chat view** (Ctrl+Alt+I), not Inline Chat (Ctrl+I), for slash commands with auto-completion.
